findings.title: Missing Access Control
findings.description: Sensitive operations execute without Runtime.CheckWitness or equivalent guard.
findings.recommendation: Enforce authorization for state-changing and privileged methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=6.00, peak_complexity=6, uncertainty=0.296, penalty=0.074, confidence 0.850->0.776.

findings.title: Over-Privileged External Call Flags
findings.description: External call uses CallFlags.All (0x0F), enabling full callee capabilities.
findings.recommendation: Reduce call flags to the minimum required permissions (least privilege).
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=6.00, peak_complexity=6, uncertainty=0.296, penalty=0.074, confidence 0.850->0.776.

findings.title: Over-Privileged External Call Flags
findings.description: External call uses CallFlags.All (0x0F), enabling full callee capabilities.

findings.title: Unchecked Arithmetic Operation
findings.description: Operation ADD may overflow or underflow without runtime guard.
findings.recommendation: Validate arithmetic bounds or assert invariants before state updates.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=6.00, peak_complexity=6, uncertainty=0.296, penalty=0.074, confidence 0.800->0.726.

findings.description: Operation SUB may overflow or underflow without runtime guard.
findings.recommendation: Validate arithmetic bounds or assert invariants before state updates.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:bls12381Pairing' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=6.00, peak_complexity=6, uncertainty=0.296, penalty=0.074, confidence 0.700->0.626.

findings.title: Potential Unbounded Loop
findings.description: Execution path depth=97 with loop back-edges detected.
findings.recommendation: Add bounded iteration checks and short-circuit exit conditions.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=5, avg_complexity=5.40, peak_complexity=6, uncertainty=0.612, penalty=0.153, confidence 0.700->0.547.

findings.title: Overly Broad Manifest Permissions
findings.description: Manifest allows unrestricted contract/method calls, expanding the callable trust surface.
findings.recommendation: Restrict manifest permissions to explicit contract hashes and method names.
findings.confidence_reason: Static confidence baseline 0.700; no execution-path uncertainty context.
